txt.en: 'You've arrived at last! Hurry, hurry! You need to drink six more beers before the time expires. So stop talking to me and hurry up and drink! Inn League members don't just stand around and squawk like chickens. We drink!'

'Well done, friend! You still have quite some way to go.\n\n'You've now completed stage two, but there are five more to go if you wish to become a member of the Inn League! Do not get soft on us now! Head to The Golden Perch in Stock next. Go, go, go!'
Inn League Initiation -- Plough and Stars
Time expired!
'Hurry to The Plough and Stars in Brockenborings and speak with the Inn League member there. Hurry! Time is a-wasting.'
'Drunk already? You've barely begun!'

The Plough and Stars Inn is on the hill above the Watch-office in Brockenborings, east of Overhill and west of Scary.\n\nHead to The Plough and Stars Inn in Brockenborings and talk to the Inn League member there.
'Good, good...almost half-way done!'
Drink beers (4/6)
Drink six beers within the allotted amount of time.
'Oh dear, you look a bit flushed. Are you feeling ill?'
Drank beers (5/6)
Drink five more beers within the allotted amount of time.
'This is quite disturbing to watch, let me assure you!'
Drink beers (5/6)
Drink four more beers within the allotted amount of time.
'You're almost done! Don't bother breathing, just finish it!'
Drank beers (6/6)
Drink three more beers within the allotted amount of time.
Finish before time runs out!
Drink two more beers within the allotted amount of time.
Drink one more beer within the allotted amount of time.
Full and queasy with drink, you should now speak with the Inn League member in front of you.
Speak with the Inn League Member in The Plough and Stars Inn
Drink beers (0/6)
Drank beers (1/6)
Drink beers (1/6)
Drank beers (2/6)
Drink beers (2/6)
Drank beers (3/6)
Drink beers (3/6)
Drank beers (4/6)

You have expressed an interest in becoming a member of the Inn League. In order to do so, you must pass their initiation. This is a long race and only the stout of stomach and strong of will can complete it.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends. </rgb>
You have begun stage two of the Inn League's initiation.\n
